snippet: Bill’s Place in Harlem, the sort of underground jazz club once frequented by Billie Holiday and Duke Ellington, features jazz by Bill Saxton, a bebop saxophonist.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Bill's Place, BYOB jazz club operated by saxophonist Bill Saxton's out of Harlem brownstone; club is last remaining underground spot in neighborhood that once teemed with them.
lead_paragraph: Bill’s Place in Harlem, the sort of underground jazz club once frequented by Billie Holiday and Duke Ellington, features jazz by Bill Saxton, a bebop saxophonist.

headline.seo: Bill’s Place in Harlem Bringing Bebop Back Home
headline.main: A Harlem Throwback to the Era of Billie Holiday
